title: The Island at the Top of the World
description: VANISHED!A sea captain searches for his only son-who disappeared while seeking the legendary whale's graveyard. But in his search, the brave captain finds a puzzle far stranger than his son's disappearance. Caught in the mysteries of a bizarre civilization, a remnant of the ancient Vikings, the captain must battle both a strange people and the defiant forces of nature in his harrowing trek across frozen wastes and raging seas.
author: Ian Cameron
